trans-unit.source: Using the Tax File Formats (DK) Extension | Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: Using the Tax File Formats (DK) Extension | Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Použití rozšíření Tax File Formats (DK) | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: This extension makes it easy to export files that are pre-formatted to meet bank requirements for electronic submissions.

seg-source.mrk: This extension makes it easy to export files that are pre-formatted to meet bank requirements for electronic submissions.

target.mrk: Toto rozšíření usnadňuje export souborů, které jsou předem naformátovány tak, aby splňovaly bankovní požadavky na elektronická podání.

trans-unit.source: The Tax File Formats (DK) Extension for Business Central

seg-source.mrk: The Tax File Formats (DK) Extension for Business Central

target.mrk: Rozšíření Tax File Formats (DK) pro Business Central

trans-unit.source: If you engage in trade with companies, or internal branches or subsidiaries, in other EU countries you must report information about the activities to SKAT and to Statistics Denmark.

seg-source.mrk: If you engage in trade with companies, or internal branches or subsidiaries, in other EU countries you must report information about the activities to SKAT and to Statistics Denmark.

target.mrk: Pokud obchodujete se společnostmi nebo interními pobočkami nebo dceřinými společnostmi v jiných zemích EU, musíte o činnosti informovat SKAT a Dánsko.

trans-unit.source: If you use the VAT and Intrastat reporting features in [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], this extension can ensure that the file you export is compatible with requirements from these organizations.

seg-source.mrk: If you use the VAT and Intrastat reporting features in [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], this extension can ensure that the file you export is compatible with requirements from these organizations.

target.mrk: Pokud používáte funkce pro hlášení DPH a Intrastat v [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], může toto rozšíření zajistit, že exportovaný soubor bude kompatibilní s požadavky těchto organizací.

trans-unit.source: The extension adds the MS-ECSL Report Export File and Intrastat Export Lines submission codeunits to your VAT Report configuration, so you can export data in the new format right away.

seg-source.mrk: The extension adds the MS-ECSL Report Export File and Intrastat Export Lines submission codeunits to your VAT Report configuration, so you can export data in the new format right away.

target.mrk: Rozšíření přidá do vaší konfigurace sestavy DPH MS-ECSL Report Export File a Intrastat Export Lines submission codeunits, takže můžete okamžitě exportovat data v novém formátu.

trans-unit.source: The extension is free, you just need to install it.

seg-source.mrk: The extension is free, you just need to install it.

target.mrk: Rozšíření je zdarma, stačí jej nainstalovat.
